name: SF-Marin Food Bank
description: The SF-Marin Food Bank provides food to 1 in 4 San Francisco and Marin County residents, operating the largest food pantry network in the region with free groceries and nutrition programs.
fullDescription: The SF-Marin Food Bank provides food to 1 in 4 San Francisco and Marin County residents, operating the largest food pantry network in the region with free groceries and nutrition programs.
whatTheyOffer:
- Free groceries at 275+ pantry sites
- Home delivery for homebound seniors and people with disabilities
- Supplemental food for seniors 60+ at senior centers
- Fresh produce, proteins, and staples
- CalFresh application assistance
- No income verification or ID required
howToGetIt: Use the online Food Locator or call the food bank. Find a pantry near you and check their schedule. Bring your own bags. For home delivery, call to assess eligibility.
keywords: SF-Marin Food Bank, San Francisco, Marin, free food, food pantry, groceries, home delivery, senior food, CalFresh, produce
